comment: Smart Data Models - LoadMotor adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/LoadMotor/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Aggregate induction motor load. This model  is used to represent a fraction of an ordinary load as induction motor load.  It allows load that is treated as ordinary constant power in power flow analysis to be represented by an induction motor in dynamic simulation.  If  = 0. or  = , or  = 0.,  only one cage is represented. Magnetic saturation is not modelled. Either a 'one-cage' or 'two-cage' model of the induction machine can be modelled. Magnetic saturation is not modelled.

contents.name: LoadAggregate
contents.comment: Aggregate load to which this aggregate motor (dynamic) load belongs. Default: None

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: d
contents.comment: Damping factor (D).  Unit = delta P/delta speed.  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: h
contents.comment: Inertia constant (H) (not=0).  Typical Value = 0.4. Default: 0

contents.name: lfac
contents.comment: Loading factor - ratio of initial P to motor MVA base (Lfac).  Typical Value = 0.8. Default: 0.0

contents.name: lp
contents.comment: Transient reactance (Lp).  Typical Value = 0.15. Default: 0.0

contents.name: lpp
contents.comment: Subtransient reactance (Lpp).  Typical Value = 0.15. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ls
contents.comment: Synchronous reactance (Ls).  Typical Value = 3.2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: pfrac
contents.comment: Fraction of constant-power load to be represented by this motor model (Pfrac) (>=0.0 and <=1.0).  Typical Value = 0.3. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ra
contents.comment: Stator resistance (Ra).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: tbkr
contents.comment: Circuit breaker operating time (Tbkr).  Typical Value = 0.08. Default: 0

contents.name: tpo
contents.comment: Transient rotor time constant (Tpo) (not=0).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: tppo
contents.comment: Subtransient rotor time constant (Tppo).  Typical Value = 0.02. Default: 0

contents.name: tv
contents.comment: Voltage trip pickup time (Tv).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

contents.name: vt
contents.comment: Voltage threshold for tripping (Vt).  Typical Value = 0.7. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
